ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treecomponent

Interface IAttribute

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassitAttribute, CobwebAttribute

    public interface IAttribute
    The attribute value for a particular attribute key.
    Implementations store the attribute values for a particular key in the attribute map of a node.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Double>> getProbabilities()
      Gets an iterator over the attributes probability map.
      double getSumOfRatings()
      Gets the sum of all ratings of children with the same attribute key
      double getSumOfSquaredRatings()
      Gets the sum of all squared ratings of children with the same attribute key.
      int getSupport()
      Gets the number of other attributes objects (i.e. ratings) on which this attribute object is based.

    • Method Detail

      • getSupport

        int getSupport()
               throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Gets the number of other attributes objects (i.e. ratings) on which this attribute object is based. Is 1 for a ClassitAttribute of a leaf node. * 
         Example:             Av:0.45
                      Std:0.3
                      Sup:4
                      /   \
                    /       \
                  /           \
           Av:0.4             Av:0.5
           Std:0.28           Std:0.42 
           Sup:2              Sup:2 
           /   \              /    \
          /     \            /      \
      Av:0.2   Av:0.6     Av:0.8    Av:0.2
      Std:0.0  Std:0.0    Std:0.0   Std:0.0
      Sup:1    Sup:1      Sup:1     Sup:1


        Used for CLASSIT.
        Returns:
        the support value of this attribute.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException

      • getSumOfSquaredRatings

        double getSumOfSquaredRatings()
                              throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Gets the sum of all squared ratings of children with the same attribute key. 
         Example:             S:24
                      S^2:174
                      Sup:4
                      /   \
                    /       \
                  /           \
           S:7                S:17
           S^2:29             S^2:145 
           Sup:2              Sup:2 
           /   \              /    \
          /     \            /      \
      S:2      S:5        S:8       S:9
      S^2:4    S^2:25     S^2:64    S^2:81
      Sup:1    Sup:1      Sup:1     Sup:1


        Used for CLASSIT.
        Returns:
        the sum of all squared rating values of the attribute.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - for CobwebAttribute

      • getSumOfRatings

        double getSumOfRatings()
                       throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Gets the sum of all ratings of children with the same attribute key. * 
         Example:             S:24
                      S^2:174
                      Sup:4
                      /   \
                    /       \
                  /           \
           S:7                S:17
           S^2:29             S^2:145 
           Sup:2              Sup:2 
           /   \              /    \
          /     \            /      \
      S:2      S:5        S:8       S:9
      S^2:4    S^2:25     S^2:64    S^2:81
      Sup:1    Sup:1      Sup:1     Sup:1


        Used for CLASSIT.
        Returns:
        the sum of all rating values of the attribute.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - for CobwebAttribute

      • getProbabilities

        java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Double>> getProbabilities()
                                                                                            throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Gets an iterator over the attributes probability map.
        e.g.: 
           Rating Values  |    Probability
 -----------------------------------
       5          |       0.5
       1          |       0.25
       
 Probabilities do not necessarily add
 up to 1, due to the sparse nature of
 the user-content-rating matrix.


        Used for COBWEB.
        Returns:
        an iterator over all probability map entries.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - for ClassitAttributes
